scripts.build: cp -f web/main.js build/web/main.js && cp -f web/index_build.html build/web/index.html && mkdir -p build/web/src && cp -fr web/src/artemists build/web/src && cp -fr web/src/howler.js build/web/src && cp -fr web/src/pixi.js build/web/src && cp -fr web/res build/web && cat web/src/spacewar/core/Constants.js LF web/src/spacewar/core/StarField.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Background.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Bounds.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/ColorAnimation.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Enemy.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Expires.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Health.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/ParallaxStar.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Player.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Position.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/ScaleAnimation.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/SoundEffect.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Sprite.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Velocity.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/BackgroundTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/EnemyShipTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/ExplosionTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/ParticleTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/PlayerBulletTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/PlayerTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/StarTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/BackgroundSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/CollisionSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/ColorAnimationSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/EntitySpawningTimerSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/ExpiringSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/HealthRenderSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/HudRenderSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/MovementSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/ParallaxStarRepeatingSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/PlayerInputSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/RemoveOffscreenShipsSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/ScaleAnimationSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/SoundEffectSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/SpriteRenderSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/core/GameScreen.js LF web/src/spacewar/core/SpaceshipWarrior.js > build/spacewar.js  && cat web/src/spacewar/core/Constants.js LF web/src/spacewar/core/StarField.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Background.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Bounds.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/ColorAnimation.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Enemy.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Expires.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Health.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/ParallaxStar.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Player.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Position.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/ScaleAnimation.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/SoundEffect.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Sprite.js LF web/src/spacewar/components/Velocity.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/BackgroundTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/EnemyShipTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/ExplosionTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/ParticleTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/PlayerBulletTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/PlayerTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/templates/StarTemplate.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/BackgroundSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/CollisionSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/ColorAnimationSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/EntitySpawningTimerSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/ExpiringSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/HealthRenderSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/HudRenderSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/MovementSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/ParallaxStarRepeatingSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/PlayerInputSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/RemoveOffscreenShipsSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/ScaleAnimationSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/SoundEffectSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/systems/SpriteRenderSystem.js LF web/src/spacewar/core/GameScreen.js LF web/src/spacewar/core/SpaceshipWarrior.js | java -jar packages/closure-compiler/lib/vendor/compiler.jar --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js_output_file build/spacewar.min,js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/web && mkdir -p build/lib
scripts.closure: npm run transpile && tools/convert && java -jar tools/plovr.jar build config.js
scripts.deploy: cp -rf web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -rf web/src ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/main.js ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/project.json ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
scripts.preandroid: npm run predeploy && npm run transpile && npm run resources && cp -fr web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
